com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.queryprofile

Interface QueryProfileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryProfileServiceImpl

    public interface QueryProfileService
    Service for manipulating HP Haven OnDemand Query Profiles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy, String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
      Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy, ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
      Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using the given token
      QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
      Retrieves a query profile using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy, ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
      Retrieves a query profile using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy, ResourceIdentifier queryProfile, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService

    • Method Detail

      • createQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(String name,
                                              String queryManipulationIndex,
                                              QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new query profile
        queryManipulationIndex - The name of the query manipulation index
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • createQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                              String name,
                                              String queryManipulationIndex,
                                              QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        name - The name of the new query profile
        queryManipulationIndex - The name of the query manipulation index
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • retrieveQueryProfile

        QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
                           throws HodErrorException
        Retrieves a query profile using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile
        Returns:
        The query profile
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired

      • retrieveQueryProfile

        QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                  ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
                           throws HodErrorException
        Retrieves a query profile using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile
        Returns:
        The query profile
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired

      • updateQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile,
                                              String queryManipulationIndex,
                                              QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile
        queryManipulationIndex - The name of the new query manipulation index; if null then this is not updated
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile to update
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • updateQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                              ResourceIdentifier queryProfile,
                                              String queryManipulationIndex,
                                              QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile to update
        queryManipulationIndex - The name of the new query manipulation index; if null then this is not updated
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • deleteQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile to delete
        Returns:
        The name of the deleted query profile
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • deleteQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                              ResourceIdentifier queryProfile)
                                       throws HodErrorException
        Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using the given token
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        queryProfile - The domain and name of the query profile to delete
        Returns:
        The name of the deleted query profile
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException
